name: Marie Antoinette
summary_text: The tragic life of Marie Antoinette, who became queen of France in her late teens.

name: San Andreas
summary_text: In the aftermath of a massive earthquake in California, a rescue-chopper pilot makes a dangerous journey with his ex-wife across the state in order to rescue his daughter.

name: Swamp Thing
summary_text: Abby Arcane returns home to Marais, Louisiana to investigate a deadly swamp-borne virus, only to discover the dark, terrifying mysteries of the swamp.

name: Coherence
summary_text: Strange things begin to happen when a group of friends gather for a dinner party on an evening when a comet is passing overhead.

name: The Bad News Bears
summary_text: An aging, down-on-his-luck ex-minor leaguer coaches a team of misfits in an ultra-competitive California little league.

name: The Missing
summary_text: Tony and Emily Hughes' vacation turns into a nightmare when their 5-year-old son Oliver disappears from a large celebrating crowd in Northern France.

name: We Were Soldiers
summary_text: The story of the first major battle of the American phase of the Vietnam War, and the soldiers on both sides that fought it, while their wives wait nervously and anxiously at home for the good news or the bad news.

name: Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia
summary_text: An ordinary boy finds a magic amulet that chooses him to be a Trollhunter, a guardian that defends the world of humans and the secret world of trolls.

name: Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows
summary_text: Detective Sherlock Holmes is on the trail of criminal mastermind Professor Moriarty, who is carrying out a string of random crimes across Europe.

name: Alpha Dog
summary_text: Johnny and a couple pals kidnap Jake's 15-year-old brother, Zach, then assigns his buddy Frankie to be Zach's minder. They develop a brotherly friendship. Zach parties with his captors as things begin to spin out of control.

name: All About Eve
summary_text: A seemingly timid but secretly ruthless ingénue insinuates herself into the lives of an aging Broadway star and her circle of theater friends.

name: Night Court
summary_text: An eccentric fun-loving judge presides over an urban night court and all the silliness going on there.

name: Munich
summary_text: Based on the true story of the Black September aftermath, about the five men chosen to eliminate the ones responsible for that fateful day.

name: Pineapple Express
summary_text: A process server and his marijuana dealer wind up on the run from hitmen and a corrupt police officer after he witnesses his dealer's boss murder a competitor while trying to serve papers on him.

name: Farscape
summary_text: Thrown into a distant part of the universe, an Earth astronaut finds himself part of a fugitive alien starship crew.

name: The Inbetweeners
summary_text: Follows four friends and their antics during their final years of school.

name: Bad Trip
summary_text: This mix of a scripted buddy comedy road movie and a real hidden camera prank show follows the outrageous misadventures of two buds stuck in a rut who embark on a cross-country road trip to NYC. The storyline sets up shocking real pranks.

name: The Shallows
summary_text: A mere 200 yards from shore, surfer Nancy is attacked by a great white shark, with her short journey to safety becoming the ultimate contest of wills.

name: Mainstream
summary_text: In this cautionary tale, three people struggle to preserve their identities as they form an eccentric love triangle within the fast-moving internet age.

name: The Purge: Anarchy
summary_text: Three groups of people intertwine and are left stranded in the streets on Purge Night, trying to survive the chaos and violence that occurs.

name: Eraserhead
summary_text: Henry Spencer tries to survive his industrial environment, his angry girlfriend, and the unbearable screams of his newly born mutant child.

name: Under the Silver Lake
summary_text: Sam, a disenchanted young man, finds a mysterious woman swimming in his apartment's pool one night. The next morning, she disappears. Sam sets off across LA to find her, and along the way he uncovers a conspiracy far more bizarre.

name: Bridge to Terabithia
summary_text: A preteen's life turns upside down when he befriends the new girl in school and they imagine a whole new fantasy world to escape reality.

name: Rugrats
summary_text: Tommy, Chuckie, and the Rugrats crew return for all-new adventures.

name: Ralph Breaks the Internet
summary_text: Six years after the events of "Wreck-It Ralph," Ralph and Vanellope, now friends, discover a wi-fi router in their arcade, leading them into a new adventure.

name: Sideways
summary_text: Two men reaching middle age with not much to show but disappointment embark on a week-long road trip through California's wine country, just as one is about to take a trip down the aisle.

name: The Kingdom
summary_text: A team of U.S. government agents are sent to investigate the bombing of an American facility in the Middle East.

name: Neighbors
summary_text: After they are forced to live next to a fraternity house, a couple with a newborn baby do whatever they can to take them down.

name: Bad Blood
summary_text: A dramatization of the life and death of Montreal mob boss Vito Rizzuto.

name: The Cuphead Show!
summary_text: Follow the misadventures of the impulsive Cuphead and his cautious but persuadable brother Mugman in this animated series based on the hit video game.

name: A Touch of Frost
summary_text: DI Jack Frost is an unconventional policeman with sympathy for the underdog and an instinct for moral justice. Sloppy, disorganized and disrespectful, he attracts trouble like a magnet.

name: Amphibia
summary_text: Ordinary Anne Boonchuy, 13, finds a treasure chest that sends her to Amphibia, a world full of frogs, toads, and giant insects. With help from Sprig, she must adjust to life in Amphibia and discover her first true friendship in her life.

name: Wreck-It Ralph
summary_text: A video game villain wants to be a hero and sets out to fulfill his dream, but his quest brings havoc to the whole arcade where he lives.

name: The Babadook
summary_text: A single mother and her child fall into a deep well of paranoia when an eerie children's book titled "Mister Babadook" manifests in their home.

name: The World Is Not Enough
summary_text: James Bond uncovers a nuclear plot while protecting an oil heiress from her former kidnapper, an international terrorist who can't feel pain.

name: The Mess You Leave Behind
summary_text: Based on the novel of the same name winner of the Primavera award 2016. Raquel, a young literature teacher, gives her marriage a second chance and moves to her husband's birth town, which hides a dark secret she will try to unravel.

name: Move to Heaven
summary_text: Working as trauma cleaners, both Gu-ru and Sang-gu uncover various stories of the deceased while experiencing different emotions and sentiments toward life, death and family.

name: Star Trek: Lower Decks
summary_text: The support crew serving on one of Starfleet's least important ships, the U.S.S. Cerritos, have to keep up with their duties, often while the ship is being rocked by a multitude of sci-fi anomalies.

name: Hellboy
summary_text: A demon, raised from infancy after being conjured by and rescued from the Nazis, grows up to become a defender against the forces of darkness.

name: TURN: Washington's Spies
summary_text: A Long Island farmer bands together a group of childhood friends to form an unlikely group of spies who turn the tide in America's fight for independence.

name: Piranha 3D
summary_text: After a sudden underwater tremor sets free scores of the prehistoric man-eating fish, an unlikely group of strangers must band together to stop themselves from becoming fish food for the area's new razor-toothed residents.

name: Becky
summary_text: A teenager's weekend at a lake house with her father takes a turn for the worse when a group of convicts wreaks havoc on their lives.

name: Red Dead Redemption II
summary_text: Amidst the decline of the Wild West at the turn of the 19th century, outlaw Arthur Morgan and his gang struggle to cope with the loss of their way of life.

name: Romeo and Juliet
summary_text: When two young members of feuding families meet, forbidden love ensues.

name: The Amityville Horror
summary_text: Newlyweds are terrorized by demonic forces after moving into a large house that was the site of a grisly mass murder a year before.

name: Fatal Attraction
summary_text: A married man's one-night stand comes back to haunt him when that lover begins to stalk him and his family.

name: Melrose Place
summary_text: Classic serial drama around a group of friends living in Melrose Place, California.

name: Over the Moon
summary_text: In this animated musical, a girl builds a rocket ship and blasts off, hoping to meet a mythical moon goddess.

name: Dollface
summary_text: After breaking up with her longtime boyfriend, a woman tries to reconnect with the friends she lost during the relationship.

name: Dog Day Afternoon
summary_text: Three amateur bank robbers plan to hold up a bank. A nice simple robbery: Walk in, take the money, and run. Unfortunately, the supposedly uncomplicated heist suddenly becomes a bizarre nightmare as everything that could go wrong does.

name: Taken 2
summary_text: In Istanbul, retired CIA operative Bryan Mills and his wife are taken hostage by the father of a kidnapper Mills killed while rescuing his daughter.

name: Chicago
summary_text: Two death-row murderesses develop a fierce rivalry while competing for publicity, celebrity, and a sleazy lawyer's attention.

name: Frida
summary_text: A biography of artist Frida Kahlo, who channeled the pain of a crippling injury and her tempestuous marriage into her work.

name: Trading Places
summary_text: A snobbish investor and a wily street con artist find their positions reversed as part of a bet by two callous millionaires.

name: The Talented Mr. Ripley
summary_text: In late 1950s New York, Tom Ripley, a young underachiever, is sent to Italy to retrieve Dickie Greenleaf, a rich and spoiled millionaire playboy. But when the errand fails, Ripley takes extreme measures.

name: Hill Street Blues
summary_text: The lives and work of the staff of an inner city police precinct.

name: Finding 'Ohana
summary_text: A summer in rural O‘ahu takes an exciting turn for two Brooklyn-raised siblings when a journal pointing to long-lost treasure sets them on an epic adventure with new friends, and leads them to reconnect with their Hawaiian heritage.

name: The Virginian
summary_text: Personable Western series based in Wyoming from the 1890s onward.

name: House of Wax
summary_text: A group of teens are unwittingly stranded near a strange wax museum and soon must fight to survive and keep from becoming the next exhibit.

name: Christine
summary_text: A nerdish boy buys a strange car with an evil mind of its own and his nature starts to change to reflect it.

name: True History of the Kelly Gang
summary_text: Based on Peter Carey's novel. The story of Australian bushranger Ned Kelly and his gang as they flee from authorities during the 1870s.

name: Awake
summary_text: A wealthy young man undergoing heart transplant surgery discovers that the surgical team intend to murder him.

name: Double Lover
summary_text: Chloé, a fragile young woman, falls in love with her psychoanalyst, Paul. A few months later she moves in with him, but soon discovers that her lover is concealing a part of his identity.

name: Below Deck Mediterranean
summary_text: A reality show following the crew of the Ionian Princess, a luxury charter yacht in the Mediterranean.

name: Steins;Gate
summary_text: After discovering time travel, a university student and his colleagues must use their knowledge of it to stop an evil organization and their diabolical plans.

name: Bottle Rocket
summary_text: Three friends plan to pull off a simple robbery and go on the run.

name: Unknown
summary_text: When a man awakens from a coma only to discover that someone has taken on his identity, he teams up with a young woman to prove who he is.

name: Dreamland
summary_text: A teenager's adventures as a bounty hunter take an unexpected twist.

name: Pale Rider
summary_text: A mysterious preacher (Clint Eastwood) protects a humble prospector village from a greedy mining company trying to encroach on their land.

name: The Matrix Revolutions
summary_text: The human city of Zion defends itself against the massive invasion of the machines as Neo fights to end the war at another front while also opposing the rogue Agent Smith.

name: A Bronx Tale
summary_text: A father becomes worried when a local gangster befriends his son in the Bronx in the 1960s.

name: Dark Side of the Ring
summary_text: From backstage controversies to mysterious deaths and unsolved homicides, this series explores the darkest stories from the golden age of professional wrestling, and tries to find truth at the intersection of fantasy and reality.

name: Scary Stories to Tell in the Dark
summary_text: On Halloween 1968, Stella and her two friends meet a mysterious drifter, Ramón, and uncover a sinister notebook of stories.

name: Buck Rogers in the 25th Century
summary_text: A 20th-century astronaut emerges out of 500 years of suspended animation into a future time to become Earth's greatest hero.

name: Hitch
summary_text: A smooth-talking man falls for a hardened columnist while helping a shy accountant woo a beautiful heiress.

name: El Dorado
summary_text: Cole Thornton, a gunfighter for hire, joins forces with an old friend, Sheriff J.P. Hara. Together with an old Indian fighter and a gambler, they help a rancher and his family fight a rival rancher that is trying to steal their water.

name: Point Break
summary_text: A young FBI agent infiltrates an extraordinary team of extreme sports athletes he suspects of masterminding a string of unprecedented, sophisticated corporate heists.

name: Intergalactic
summary_text: It follows a crew of fierce female convicts who break free and go on the run.

name: Life in Pieces
summary_text: A family comedy told through the separate stories of different family members.

name: The Danish Girl
summary_text: A fictitious love story loosely inspired by the lives of Danish artists Lili Elbe and Gerda Wegener. Lili and Gerda's marriage and work evolve as they navigate Lili's groundbreaking journey as a transgender pioneer.

name: No Man of God
summary_text: The complicated relationship that formed between the FBI analyst Bill Hagmaier and serial killer Bundy during Bundy's final years on death row.

name: Resident Evil: Apocalypse
summary_text: Alice wakes up in the Raccoon City hospital after the area has been overrun by zombies, and must now make it out of the city before a nuclear bomb is dropped.

name: Florence Foster Jenkins
summary_text: The story of Florence Foster Jenkins, a New York heiress who dreamed of becoming an opera singer, despite having a terrible singing voice.

name: The Last Duel
summary_text: King Charles VI declares that Knight Jean de Carrouges settle his dispute with his squire by challenging him to a duel.

name: Barney Miller
summary_text: The Captain of the NYPD 12th Precinct and his staff handle the various local troubles and characters that come into the squad room.

name: The Water Man
summary_text: A boy sets out on a quest to save his ill mother by searching for a mythic figure said to have magical healing powers.

name: Insidious: The Last Key
summary_text: Parapsychologist Dr. Elise Rainier faces her most fearsome and personal haunting yet, as she is drawn back to her ghostly childhood home, where the terror began.

name: He's Just Not That Into You
summary_text: This Baltimore-set movie of interconnecting story arcs deals with the challenges of reading or misreading human behavior.

name: Anaconda
summary_text: A "National Geographic" film crew is taken hostage by an insane hunter, who forces them along on his quest to capture the world's largest - and deadliest - snake.

name: The Cell
summary_text: An F.B.I. Agent persuades a social worker, who is adept with a new experimental technology, to enter the mind of a comatose serial killer in order to learn where he has hidden his latest kidnap victim.

name: Stalker
summary_text: A guide leads two men through an area known as the Zone to find a room that grants wishes.

name: The Birds
summary_text: A wealthy San Francisco socialite pursues a potential boyfriend to a small Northern California town that slowly takes a turn for the bizarre when birds of all kinds suddenly begin to attack people.

name: Blue Mountain State
summary_text: Three incoming freshmen attending Midwestern college football powerhouse Blue Mountain State must quickly adapt to college life and juggle football, girls, classes and nonstop hazing.

name: Wish Dragon 2
summary_text: The story is about - family, fatherhood, baby Luck Dragons - and Long's transformation into fatherhood.

name: Harold & Kumar Go to White Castle
summary_text: A Korean-American office worker and his Indian-American stoner friend embark on a quest to satisfy their desire for White Castle burgers.

name: Law & Order: UK
summary_text: UK version of the long-running U.S. TV drama that tells the stories of two separate yet equally important groups: the police, who investigate crime; and the attorneys, who prosecute the offenders.

name: Honey, I Shrunk the Kids
summary_text: The scientist father of a teenage girl and boy accidentally shrinks his and two other neighborhood teens to the size of insects. Now the teens must fight diminutive dangers as the father searches for them.

name: Coronation Street
summary_text: The world's longest-running television soap, Coronation Street focuses on the everyday lives of working class people in Manchester, England.

name: Westworld
summary_text: A robot malfunction creates havoc and terror for unsuspecting vacationers at a futuristic, adult-themed amusement park.

name: Barbarella
summary_text: Barbarella, an astronaut from the 41st century, sets out to find and stop the evil scientist Durand Durand, whose Positronic Ray threatens to bring evil back into the galaxy.

name: Battle Royale
summary_text: In the future, the Japanese government captures a class of ninth-grade students and forces them to kill each other under the revolutionary "Battle Royale" act.

name: The King's Speech
summary_text: The story of King George VI, his impromptu ascension to the throne of the British Empire in 1936, and the speech therapist who helped the unsure monarch overcome his stammer.

name: Only Fools and Horses
summary_text: Comedy that follows two brothers from London's rough Peckham estate as they wheel and deal through a number of dodgy deals and search for the big score that'll make them millionaires.

name: The Adjustment Bureau
summary_text: The affair between a politician and a contemporary dancer is affected by mysterious forces keeping the lovers apart.

name: Close Encounters of the Third Kind
summary_text: Roy Neary, an electric lineman, watches how his quiet and ordinary daily life turns upside down after a close encounter with a UFO.

name: Exit
summary_text: A dark drama series based on true stories from Norway's financial scene.

name: Bruce Almighty
summary_text: A guy who complains about God too often is given almighty powers to teach him how difficult it is to run the world.

name: Men in Black II
summary_text: Agent Jay is sent to find Agent Kay and restore his memory after the re-appearance of a case from Kay's past.

name: Utopia
summary_text: After a group of people, who meet online, discover a bizarre graphic novel which seems to hold mysterious answers, they find themselves being tracked down by a merciless organization known merely as 'The Network'.

name: Slither
summary_text: A small town is taken over by an alien plague, turning residents into zombies and all forms of mutant monsters.

name: Raising Hope
summary_text: Jimmy becomes a single parent to an infant after her mother, with whom he had a one-night stand, ends up on Death Row.

name: Beauty and the Beast
summary_text: A beautiful detective falls in love with an ex-soldier who goes into hiding from the secret government organization that turned him into a mechanically charged beast.

name: Mr. Nobody
summary_text: A boy stands on a station platform as a train is about to leave. Should he go with his mother or stay with his father? Infinite possibilities arise from this decision. As long as he doesn't choose, anything is possible.

name: Moonstruck
summary_text: Loretta Castorini, a bookkeeper from Brooklyn, New York, finds herself in a difficult situation when she falls for the brother of the man she has agreed to marry.

name: The Flintstones
summary_text: In a parallel modern-day Stone Age world, a working-class family, the Flintstones, are set up for an executive job. But they learn that money can't buy happiness.

name: Impractical Jokers
summary_text: Q, Sal, Joe and Murr are real-life best friends who love challenging each other to the most outrageous dares and stunts ever caught on hidden camera.

name: Brothers
summary_text: While on tour in Afghanistan, Sam's copter is shot down and he is presumed dead. Back home, it is his screw-up brother who looks after the family. Sam does return, but with a lot of excess baggage.

name: Treasure Planet
summary_text: A Disney animated version of "Treasure Island". The only difference is that this movie is set in outer space with alien worlds and other galactic wonders.

name: We Need to Talk About Kevin
summary_text: Kevin's mother struggles to love her strange child, despite the increasingly dangerous things he says and does as he grows up. But Kevin is just getting started, and his final act will be beyond anything anyone imagined.

name: Yours, Mine & Ours
summary_text: A widowed Coast Guard Admiral and a widow handbag designer fall in love and marry, much to the dismay of her 10 and his 8 children.

name: 17 Again
summary_text: Mike O'Donnell is ungrateful for how his life turned out. He gets a chance to rewrite his life when he tried to save a janitor near a bridge and jumped after him into a time vortex.

name: Jackass 4
summary_text: After ten years, the Jackass crew is back for their final crusade.

name: Finding Dory
summary_text: Friendly but forgetful blue tang Dory begins a search for her long-lost parents, and everyone learns a few things about the real meaning of family along the way.

name: Eden
summary_text: A human girl secretly raised by robots starts to uncover the dark secrets behind her lush, utopian world where humanity has all but vanished.

name: Magic Mike
summary_text: A male stripper teaches a younger performer how to party, pick up women, and make easy money.

name: Superman II
summary_text: Superman agrees to sacrifice his powers to start a relationship with Lois Lane, unaware that three Kryptonian criminals he inadvertently released are conquering Earth.

name: It's a Mad Mad Mad Mad World
summary_text: A group of motorists hear about a crook's hidden stash of loot and race against each other across the country to get to it.

name: The Disaster Artist
summary_text: When Greg Sestero, an aspiring film actor, meets the weird and mysterious Tommy Wiseau in an acting class, they form a unique friendship and travel to Hollywood to make their dreams come true.

name: Swimming Pool
summary_text: A British mystery author visits her publisher's home in the South of France, where her interaction with his unusual daughter sets off some touchy dynamics.

name: X2: X-Men United
summary_text: When anti-mutant Colonel William Stryker kidnaps Professor X and attacks his school, the X-Men must ally with their archenemy Magneto to stop him.

name: Ken Park
summary_text: Ken Park is about several Californian skateboarders' lives and relationships with and without their parents.

name: The Lego Batman Movie
summary_text: A cooler-than-ever Bruce Wayne must deal with the usual suspects as they plan to rule Gotham City, while discovering that he has accidentally adopted a teenage orphan who wishes to become his sidekick.

name: Peep Show
summary_text: Mark and Jez are a couple of twenty-something roommates who have nothing in common - except for the fact that their lives are anything but normal. Mayhem ensues as the pair strive to cope with day-to-day life.

name: Gintama
summary_text: In an era where aliens have invaded and taken over feudal Tokyo, an unemployed samurai finds work however he can.

name: Evolution
summary_text: A fire-fighting cadet, two college professors, and a geeky but sexy government scientist work against an alien organism that has been rapidly evolving since its arrival on Earth inside a meteor.

name: Her Pen Pal
summary_text: Event planner Victoria can't wait to attend and plan her best friend's wedding in Paris. But when she finds out her ex is bringing a date, Victoria reconnects with her French childhood pen pal.

name: Vanilla Sky
summary_text: A self-indulgent and vain publishing magnate finds his privileged life upended after a vehicular accident with a resentful lover.

name: The Chronicles of Riddick
summary_text: The wanted criminal Richard Bruno Riddick (Vin Diesel) arrives on a planet called Helion Prime and finds himself up against an invading empire called the Necromongers, an army that plans to convert or kill all humans in the universe.

name: The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants
summary_text: Four best girlfriends hatch a plan to stay connected with one another as their lives start off in different directions: they pass around a pair of secondhand jeans that fits each of their bodies perfectly.

name: The Long Kiss Goodnight
summary_text: Samantha Caine lives in a small town with her daughter. Eight years ago she emerged, two months pregnant, from a nearby river with no memory of her past or who she is. However, she's getting closer to finding out about her past.

name: Sexy Beast
summary_text: Brutal gangster Don Logan recruits "retired" safecracker Gal for one last job, but it goes badly for both of them.

name: North by Northwest
summary_text: A New York City advertising executive goes on the run after being mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies.

name: Sex and the City 2
summary_text: While wrestling with the pressures of life, love, and work in Manhattan, Carrie, Miranda, and Charlotte join Samantha for a trip to Abu Dhabi (United Arab Emirates), where Samantha's ex is filming a new movie.

name: Alien³
summary_text: After her last encounter, Ellen Ripley crash-lands on Fiorina 161, a maximum security prison. When a series of strange and deadly events occur shortly after her arrival, Ripley realizes that she has brought along an unwelcome visitor.

name: The Rainmaker
summary_text: An underdog lawyer takes on a fraudulent insurance company.

name: Into the Night
summary_text: When radiation from the sun causes a global disaster on Earth, survivors on an overnight flight from Brussels race from city to city trying to stay ahead of the sun's rays by remaining in the cover of night.

name: Mission: Impossible II
summary_text: IMF agent Ethan Hunt is sent to Sydney to find and destroy a genetically modified disease called "Chimera".

name: Paris, Texas
summary_text: Travis Henderson, an aimless drifter who has been missing for four years, wanders out of the desert and must reconnect with society, himself, his life, and his family.

name: American Outlaws
summary_text: 5 Southern friends return home when the war ends 1865. But Yankee soldiers and Pinkerton are busy helping a railroad baron grab land from farmers along the planned railroad west. The 5 friends fight back.

name: Don't Worry Darling
summary_text: A 1950's housewife living with her husband in a utopian experimental community begins to worry that his glamorous company may be hiding disturbing secrets.

name: Isle of Dogs
summary_text: Set in Japan, Isle of Dogs follows a boy's odyssey in search of his lost dog.

name: Time Bandits
summary_text: A young boy accidentally joins a band of time travelling dwarves, as they jump from era to era looking for treasure to steal.

name: Holidate
summary_text: Fed up with being single on holidays, two strangers agree to be each other's platonic plus-ones all year long, only to catch real feelings along the way.

name: This Is Where I Leave You
summary_text: After their father passes away, four grown siblings are forced to return to their childhood home and live under the same roof for a week, along with their over-sharing mother and an assortment of spouses, exes and might-have-beens.

name: The Bourne Supremacy
summary_text: When Jason Bourne is framed for a CIA operation gone awry, he is forced to resume his former life as a trained assassin to survive.

name: Drag Me to Hell
summary_text: A loan officer who evicts an old woman from her home finds herself the recipient of a supernatural curse. Desperate, she turns to a seer to try and save her soul, while evil forces work to push her to a breaking point.

name: Fairy Tail
summary_text: Lucy, an aspiring Celestial Wizard, becomes a friend and ally to powerful wizards Natsu, Gray, and Erza, who are part of the (in)famous wizard guild, Fairy Tail.

name: Red Dawn
summary_text: It is the dawn of World War III. In mid-western America, a group of teenagers band together to defend their town, and their country, from invading Soviet forces.

name: Mud
summary_text: Two young boys encounter a fugitive and form a pact to help him evade the vigilantes that are on his trail and to reunite him with his true love.

name: World Trade Center
summary_text: Two Port Authority police officers become trapped under the rubble of the World Trade Center.

name: My Girl
summary_text: A young girl, on the threshold of her teen years, finds her life turning upside down, when she is accompanied by an unlikely friend.

name: Sleepless in Seattle
summary_text: A recently widowed man's son calls a radio talk-show in an attempt to find his father a partner.

name: Pretty Baby
summary_text: A teenage girl lives as a prostitute in New Orleans in 1917.

name: V
summary_text: An extraterrestrial race arrives on Earth with seemingly good intentions, only to slowly reveal their true machinations the more ingrained into society they become.

name: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid
summary_text: Wyoming, early 1900s. Butch Cassidy and The Sundance Kid are the leaders of a band of outlaws. After a train robbery goes wrong they find themselves on the run with a posse hard on their heels. Their solution - escape to Bolivia.

name: Megamind
summary_text: Evil genius Megamind finally defeats his do-gooder nemesis, Metro Man, but is left without a purpose in a superhero-free world.

name: Aquamarine
summary_text: Two teenage girls discover a mermaid in their beach club's swimming pool.

name: Barry Lyndon
summary_text: An Irish rogue wins the heart of a rich widow and assumes her dead husband's aristocratic position in 18th-century England.

name: Unorthodox
summary_text: Story of a young ultra-Orthodox Jewish woman who flees her arranged marriage and religious community to start a new life abroad.

name: Nikita
summary_text: A rogue assassin returns to take down the secret organization that trained her.

name: Raging Bull
summary_text: The life of boxer Jake LaMotta, whose violence and temper that led him to the top in the ring destroyed his life outside of it.

name: Panic Room
summary_text: A divorced woman and her diabetic daughter take refuge in their newly-purchased house's safe room, when three men break-in, searching for a missing fortune.

name: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
summary_text: A team of experts and scientists undertakes exhaustive research at Skinwalker Ranch, an infamous location for paranormal activity and UFO sightings.

name: Empire
summary_text: A hip-hop mogul must choose a successor among his three sons who are battling for control over his multi-million dollar company, while his ex-wife schemes to reclaim what is hers.

name: Paatal Lok
summary_text: A down and out cop lands the case of a lifetime when four suspects are nabbed in the assassination attempt of a journalist. The pursuit of it leads him to 'Paatal Lok', and to shocking discoveries in the past of the four suspects.

name: Epic Movie
summary_text: A spoof on previous years' epic movies (The Da Vinci Code (2006), The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe (2005) + 20 more), TV series, music videos and celebs. 4 orphans are on an epic adventure.

name: Rules of Engagement
summary_text: Two couples and their single friend, all at different stages in their relationships, deal with the complications of dating, commitment, and marriage.

name: Leprechaun
summary_text: An evil, sadistic Leprechaun goes on a killing rampage in search of his beloved pot of gold.

name: Taxi
summary_text: The staff of a New York City taxicab company go about their job while they dream of greater things.

name: Pet Sematary
summary_text: Dr. Louis Creed and his wife, Rachel, relocate from Boston to rural Maine with their two young children. The couple soon discover a mysterious burial ground hidden deep in the woods near their new home.

name: Papillon
summary_text: A man befriends a fellow criminal as the two of them begin serving their sentence on a dreadful prison island, which inspires the man to plot his escape.

name: Sandeep Aur Pinky Faraar
summary_text: A story of a man and woman who represent two completely different Indias. They are united in one thing only. Their mistrust, suspicion, and hate for each other.

name: American Pie Presents: Girls' Rules
summary_text: It's Senior year at East Great Falls. Annie, Kayla, Michelle, and Stephanie decide to harness their girl power and band together to get what they want their last year of high school.

name: Empire of the Sun
summary_text: A young English boy struggles to survive under Japanese occupation of China during World War II.

name: Cars 2
summary_text: Star race car Lightning McQueen and his pal Mater head overseas to compete in the World Grand Prix race. But the road to the championship becomes rocky as Mater gets caught up in an intriguing adventure of his own: international espionage.

name: Groundhog Day
summary_text: A weatherman finds himself inexplicably living the same day over and over again.

name: Total Drama
summary_text: Animated satire of survivor reality shows featuring random teenage archetypes vying for the final prize by any means necessary.

name: The Good Lord Bird
summary_text: Ethan Hawke stars as abolitionist John Brown in this series based on the novel. "Onion" is a fictional enslaved boy who becomes a member of Brown's family of abolitionist soldiers and finds himself in the 1859 raid at Harpers Ferry.

name: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
summary_text: Sam Witwicky leaves the Autobots behind for a normal life. But when his mind is filled with cryptic symbols, the Decepticons target him and he is dragged back into the Transformers' war.

name: Cursed
summary_text: A werewolf loose in Los Angeles changes the lives of three young adults who, after being mauled by the beast, learn they must kill it in order to avoid becoming werewolves themselves.

name: Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron
summary_text: A wild stallion is captured by humans and slowly loses the will to resist training, yet, throughout his struggles for freedom, the stallion refuses to let go of the hope of one day returning home to his herd.

name: The Mountain Between Us
summary_text: Stranded after a tragic plane crash, two strangers must forge a connection to survive the extreme elements of a remote snow-covered mountain. When they realize help is not coming, they embark on a perilous journey across the wilderness.

name: Parallel
summary_text: A group of friends stumble upon a mirror that serves as a portal to a "multiverse", but soon discover that importing knowledge from the other side in order to better their lives brings increasingly dangerous consequences.

name: Manhunt
summary_text: Detective Chief Inspector Colin Sutton tracks down a serial killer.

name: Mrs. Doubtfire
summary_text: After a bitter divorce, an actor disguises himself as a female housekeeper to spend time with his children held in custody by his former wife.

name: Spies in Disguise
summary_text: When the world's best spy is turned into a pigeon, he must rely on his nerdy tech officer to save the world.

name: The Witches
summary_text: A young boy stumbles onto a witch convention and must stop them, even after he has been turned into a mouse.

name: Devious Maids
summary_text: Four Latina maids with ambition and dreams of their own work for the rich and famous in Beverly Hills.

name: Babylon
summary_text: Plot unknown. Rumored to be set in period Hollywood.

name: Tell Me a Story
summary_text: An anthology series featuring beloved fairy tales interweaving into a subversive tale of love, loss, greed, revenge and murder.

name: Bill & Ted's Excellent Adventure
summary_text: Two seemingly dumb teens set off on a quest to prepare the ultimate historical presentation with the help of a time machine.

name: 2010: The Year We Make Contact
summary_text: A joint USA-Soviet expedition is sent to Jupiter to learn exactly what happened to the "Discovery" and its H.A.L. 9000 computer.

name: Die Another Day
summary_text: James Bond is sent to investigate the connection between a North Korean terrorist and a diamond mogul, who is funding the development of an international space weapon.

name: Calls
summary_text: Told through a series of interconnected phone conversation, it chronicles the mysterious story of a group of strangers whose lives are thrown into disarray in the lead-up to an apocalyptic event.

name: Mouse
summary_text: A suspenseful story that will center around the key question, "What if we could sort out psychopaths in advance?"

name: Malcolm & Marie
summary_text: A director and his girlfriend's relationship is tested after they return home from his movie premiere and face each other's turmoil during one long night.

name: Resident Evil
summary_text: Nearly three decades after the discovery of the T-virus, an outbreak reveals the Umbrella Corporation's dark secrets. Based on the horror franchise.

name: Insatiable
summary_text: A disgraced, dissatisfied civil lawyer-turned-beauty pageant coach takes on a vengeful, bullied teenager as his client and has no idea what he's about to unleash upon the world.

name: Alexander
summary_text: Alexander, the King of Macedonia and one of the greatest army leaders in the history of warfare, conquers much of the known world.

name: The Towering Inferno
summary_text: At the opening party of a colossal, but poorly constructed, office building, a massive fire breaks out that threatens to destroy the tower and everyone in it.

name: 21 Jump Street
summary_text: The cases of an undercover police unit composed of young-looking officers specializing in youth crime.

name: Meet the Parents
summary_text: Male nurse Greg Focker meets his girlfriend's parents before proposing, but her suspicious father is every date's worst nightmare.

name: The Intruder
summary_text: A young married couple buys a beautiful house on several acres of land, only to find out that the man they bought it from refuses to let go of the property.

name: The Chronicles of Narnia: Prince Caspian
summary_text: The Pevensie siblings return to Narnia, where they are enlisted to once again help ward off an evil king and restore the rightful heir to the land's throne, Prince Caspian.

name: Indecent Proposal
summary_text: A billionaire offers one million dollars to a young married couple for one night with the wife.

name: Project Power
summary_text: When a pill that gives its users unpredictable superpowers for five minutes hits the streets of New Orleans, a teenage dealer and a local cop must team with an ex-soldier to take down the group responsible for its creation.

name: Snow White and the Huntsman
summary_text: In a twist to the fairy tale, the Huntsman ordered to take Snow White into the woods to be killed winds up becoming her protector and mentor in a quest to vanquish the Evil Queen.

name: Mass Effect 2
summary_text: After being revived from death and having to join a pro-human organization without a choice, Commander Shepard must assemble a team, battle a new threat, and make tough choices in order to save the galaxy from total annihilation once more.

name: Back to School
summary_text: To help his discouraged son get through college, a funloving and obnoxious rich businessman decides to enter the school as a student himself.

name: Drake & Josh
summary_text: Two teens become step brothers. One is an awkward geek and the other is a popular musician.

name: Terminator Salvation
summary_text: In 2018, a mysterious new weapon in the war against the machines, half-human and half-machine, comes to John Connor on the eve of a resistance attack on Skynet. But whose side is he on, and can he be trusted?

name: Sling Blade
summary_text: Karl Childers, a simple man hospitalized since his childhood murder of his mother and her lover, is released to start a new life in a small town.

name: Dr. Quinn, Medicine Woman
summary_text: The trials and adventures of a female doctor in a small Wild West town.

name: Waterworld
summary_text: In a future where the polar ice-caps have melted and Earth is almost entirely submerged, a mutated mariner fights starvation and outlaw "smokers," and reluctantly helps a woman and a young girl try to find dry land.

name: Mob Psycho 100
summary_text: A psychic middle school boy tries to live a normal life and keep his growing powers under control, even though he constantly gets into trouble.

name: Power Rangers
summary_text: A group of high-school students, who are infused with unique superpowers, harness their abilities in order to save the world.

name: Hudson & Rex
summary_text: Detective Charlie Hudson teams up with what he calls his "highly trained law enforcement animal" German Shepherd dog named Rex who he prefers to team up with because he doesn't talk his ear off.

name: Perfect Blue
summary_text: A pop singer gives up her career to become an actress, but she slowly goes insane when she starts being stalked by an obsessed fan and what seems to be a ghost of her past.

name: Match Point
summary_text: At a turning point in his life, a former tennis pro falls for an actress who happens to be dating his friend and soon-to-be brother-in-law.

name: The Quick and the Dead
summary_text: A female gunfighter returns to a frontier town where a dueling tournament is being held, which she enters in an effort to avenge her father's death.

name: Masterminds
summary_text: A guard at an armored car company in the Southern U.S. organizes one of the biggest bank heists in American history. Based on the October 1997 Loomis Fargo robbery.

name: The Best of Me
summary_text: A pair of former high school sweethearts reunite after many years when they return to visit their small hometown.

name: The Island
summary_text: A man living in a futuristic sterile colony begins to question his circumscribed existence when his friend is chosen to go to the Island, the last uncontaminated place on earth.

name: A Beautiful Day in the Neighborhood
summary_text: Based on the true story of a real-life friendship between Fred Rogers and journalist Lloyd Vogel.

name: Bachelor Party
summary_text: A soon-to-be-married man's friends throw him the ultimate bachelor party.

name: The Tourist
summary_text: Revolves around Frank, an American tourist visiting Italy to mend a broken heart. Elise is an extraordinary woman who deliberately crosses his path.

name: Safe
summary_text: After his teenage daughter goes missing, a widowed surgeon begins uncovering dark secrets of the people closest to him.

name: The Courier
summary_text: A courier in London discovers that one of the packages she's transporting is a bomb.

name: Green Zone
summary_text: Discovering covert and faulty intelligence causes a U.S. Army officer to go rogue as he hunts for Weapons of Mass Destruction in an unstable region.

name: North Hollywood
summary_text: The first ever movie about becoming a pro skater.

name: Dirty Harry
summary_text: When a madman calling himself "the Scorpio Killer" menaces the city, tough-as-nails San Francisco Police Inspector "Dirty" Harry Callahan is assigned to track down and ferret out the crazed psychopath.

name: Medium
summary_text: Suburban mom Allison DuBois attempts to balance family life with solving mysteries using her special gift. The dead send her visions of their deaths or other crimes while she sleeps.

name: Paddington
summary_text: A young Peruvian bear travels to London in search of a home. Finding himself lost and alone at Paddington Station, he meets the kindly Brown family, who offer him a temporary haven.

name: Ender's Game
summary_text: Young Ender Wiggin is recruited by the International Military to lead the fight against the Formics, an insectoid alien race who had previously tried to invade Earth and had inflicted heavy losses on humankind.

name: Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
summary_text: After having escaped the Maze, the Gladers now face a new set of challenges on the open roads of a desolate landscape filled with unimaginable obstacles.

name: Horrible Bosses
summary_text: Three friends conspire to murder their awful bosses when they realize they are standing in the way of their happiness.

name: The First Purge
summary_text: America's third political party, the New Founding Fathers of America, comes to power and conducts an experiment: no laws for 12 hours on Staten Island. No one has to stay on the island, but $5,000 is given to anyone who does.

name: Searching
summary_text: After his teenage daughter goes missing, a desperate father tries to find clues on her laptop.

name: I Think You Should Leave with Tim Robinson
summary_text: In this new sketch show, Tim Robinson and guests spend each segment driving someone to the point of needing -- or desperately wanting -- to leave.

name: St. Elmo's Fire
summary_text: A group of friends, just out of college, struggle with adulthood.
